DOC.brief_summary: To examine whether Docosahexaenoic Acid ( DHA ) Docosahexaenoic + Eicosapentaenoic Acids ( DHA+EPA ) supplementation addition National Cholesterol Education Program Step I Diet Hypercholesterolemic Children increase Docosahexaenoic Acid ( DHA ) plasma level 2 intervention group versus placebo . Secondary outcome measure : effect DHA DHA+EPA supplementation blood lipid profile
DOC.brief_title: Effects Docosahexaenoic Eicosapentaenoic Acids Hypercholesterolemic Children Plus Diet Docosahexaenoic Acid ( DHA ) Status
DOC.detailed_description: In double-blind placebo-controlled trial 36 hypercholesterolemic child , 3-13 year age , 19 male 17 female put National Cholesterol Education Program ( NCEP ) Step-I diet randomise 3 group receive 500 mg/day purify Docosahexaenoic Acid ( DHA ) , Docosahexaenoic Acid plus Eicosapentaenoic Acid ( DHA+EPA ) mixture ( 228 + 208 mg/day respectively ) , wheat germ oil placebo . They underwent baseline 4 month treatment : EPA DHA level total plasma phospholipid , triglyceride , cholesteryl ester ; dietary habit food frequency questionnaire ; blood lipid profile ( total cholesterol , HDL cholesterol , triglyceride level )
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis primary hypercholesterolemia ( total cholesterol level > 200 mg/dl enter study ) BMI > 3°and < 97° percentile age First refer Lipid Clinic Secondary dyslipidemia Obesity Step I diet dietary supplement enter study
